About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm an IT technician, currently leader of a development team with experience in web and mobile applications, from a software company where we develop solutions for medical laboratories. I have knowledge in .NET C# / Javascript / JQuery / XML / SQL / Subversion / Jenkins. I am studying in a self-taught way React.js, Node.js, Redux, Express and MongoDB, among others.

Although I can currently consider myself a .Net developer, I also want to be able to apply my studies in Javascript frameworks and I am interested in projects that use these technologies.

Solutica S.R.L

Duties:

As technical support:(First year)

  • Telephone and email communication with the client.
  • Analysis and quick resolution of problems. Monitoring results.

As Developer: (Second to fourth year)

  • Analysis of clientâ€™s requirements for the development of new product modules or changes to the existing ones. Bug fixing.
  • Creation of new modules for the product using the knowns programming languages.

As Development Leader: (Fourth year to present)

  • Planning and technical support to PMO for analysis of new customer requirements.
  • Organization of team hours and resources to perform tasks.
  • Coordination with Testing area for delivery of developed work.
  • Training and constant support to the team.
  • Search and job interview to potential new resources for the team.
  • Implementing of Key Performance Indicators.
